Articles.Content:
My problem is when toy change the part variant to LF/LFO it changes in the right click menu/box but it doesn't add any fuel. I have already done a fresh install of it and still doesn't work. Thats when building a new craft, if I load up an older craft I have already built the fuel registers. I have tried everything short of deleting and reinstalling all of my mods, which I really don't want to do. Any help or suggestions to fix this will be greatly appreciated. Here's a link to a pic to show what I mean. http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j353/Gregali46290/screenshot73_zpsyjmhlfwo.png

Edited April 23, 2015 by Gregali46290
Fuel in B9 parts is managed with fsfuelswitch, make sure the latest version of firespitter.dll is installed
You're not using this mod as well, are you?

Ok, well that mod caused a similar issue with the Real Fuels config that was included with it.

So I'd suspect that one of your other mods is causing a similar issue
